summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Community Development Coastal Zone Management Program; authorizing amendment to an agreement with the State of Washington, Department of Ecology, for a Coastal Zone Management Grant; authorizing acceptance of an additional Ten Thousand Dollars ($10,000) of grant funding; authorizing the Director of the Department of Community Development to enter into agreements as may be necessary for implementation of the grant program; increasing expenditure authority in the 1980 Budget of the Department of Community Development; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
